title: Blockchain Technology General Challenge
description:
This challenge is used to test your understanding of Bitcoin and blockchain technology. The content involves understanding of proof of work, wallets, browsers, transactions, etc.
 The challenge contains about 20 multiple-choice questions, there may be one or more answers, please answer carefully.

questions.title: Who proposed Bitcoin?
options: 中本聪（Satoshi Nakamoto）
Vitalik Buterin
Nick Szabo

questions.title: Bitcoin is not just a digital currency, what else can it be?
options: Decentralized peer-to-peer network
A set of rules for validating transactions and issuing currency
A public transaction ledger
A circulating currency recognized by the laws of various countries

questions.title: What is the block time of Bitcoin?
options: About 10 minutes
About 1 minute
About 10 minutes

questions.title: What technologies does Bitcoin use?
options: Elliptic curve cryptography
Hash algorithm
MySQL database

questions.title: Which description of Bitcoin issuance is correct?
options: Bitcoin is issued with block rewards
The block reward is halved approximately every 4 years
The issuance of 21 million coins is hard-coded in the Bitcoin client
The issuance of 21 million is an approximate value calculated according to the issuance rules

questions.title: Which description of Bitcoin value (or price) is correct?
options: Determined by the Bitcoin core development team
Viewing the transaction records on the Bitcoin chain can obtain the latest price
The value of Bitcoin is determined by the market or consensus. The more buyers, the higher the price

questions.title: Which description of a hard fork is correct?
options: A hard fork will always produce a new chain
A hard fork may produce a new chain
A hard fork is also a way of network upgrade
If blocks cannot be verified after a hard fork, the client should be upgraded promptly

questions.title: What are the main sources of income for Bitcoin miners?
options: Block rewards
Transaction fees
Token airdrop rewards

questions.title: If Alice needs to send 0.1 BTC to Bob, which of the following statements is correct?
options: Alice needs to know Bob's Bitcoin address
Alice needs to know Bob's private key
Alice needs to sign the transaction
Bob needs to sign the transaction

questions.title: Blockchain technology can be applied to which of the following scenarios?
options: Preventing data tampering
Preventing the dissemination of false information
Transparent information disclosure
Exchange, lending, and other financial services

questions.title: In your opinion, the **less suitable** application scenarios for Bitcoin and Ethereum public chain technology are:
options: Applications with extremely high performance requirements
Cross-border payments
Need for massive data storage and computation

questions.title: Blockchain is usually classified into which 3 types of chains based on the degree of openness?
options: Development chain
Public blockchain (public chain)
Private blockchain (private chain)
Consortium blockchain

questions.title: Which **two** technologies make blockchain technology tamper-proof?
options: Data storage and verification are completed by distributed nodes
Blocks are linked by HASH
POW proof of work

questions.title: What information does a Bitcoin block usually contain?
options: Timestamp
Hash value of the previous block
Transaction data
IP address of the transactor

questions.title: What is the relationship between Bitcoin private key, public key, and address?
options: The public key can be derived from the private key
The address is derived from the public key
The public key can be derived from the address

questions.title: Which description of the Bitcoin UTXO model is correct?
options: UTXO refers to unspent transaction outputs
UTXO refers to spent transaction outputs
UTXO contains the balance of all addresses

questions.title: Which description of the consensus mechanism is correct?
options: The consensus mechanism is the method for reaching consensus in a distributed network
POS consensus mechanism usually has a specified block time
POW consensus mechanism usually has a specified block difficulty
The consensus mechanism usually has a specified block reward

questions.title: Which statement about Proof of Work (POW) is correct?
options: Work refers to solving mathematical problems (calculating Hash)
If you have 51% of the computing power, you can attack the network
POW actually requires miners to provide a large amount of computing power as collateral to prevent Sybil attacks
If two miners complete the proof of work at the same time, the chain will temporarily fork

questions.title: How to store private keys or mnemonic phrases, the following practices are **not recommended**?
options: Save on a connected computer using a notepad software or screenshot
Save on an online cloud drive
When sharing is needed, send it to friends using social software
Write with a pen on a piece of paper and put it in a safe deposit box

questions.title: Which description of a wallet is correct?
options: A wallet is an asset management tool because assets exist in wallet software
A wallet is a private key management and signing tool, and does not actually manage assets, but visualizes assets more
MetaMask can initiate Bitcoin transfer transactions

questions.title: Which description of a blockchain browser is correct?
options: The blockchain browser is a visual window for on-chain data
Miners can hide certain transactions in a block and not display them on the blockchain browser
The blockchain browser can query the IP address of the initiator of the transaction
The blockchain browser can query transaction amount, payee, timestamp, and other information
